{{Talk:Battle of Lissa (1811)/GA1}}
== Vis in the lede ==
I think the word "Vis" should appear visibly in the lede. I know it is there in the piped link, but the random casual visitor won't see that. The article is there for them, not for us editors. A statement showing where the place is is a useful feature of a lede. I don't mind what wording is used. [[User:BrainyBabe|BrainyBabe]] ([[User talk:BrainyBabe|talk]]) 19:59, 13 September 2009 (UTC) :"Now known as Vis" or "Later renamed Vis" -- I am indifferent. Thank you for agreeing to make the change. [[User:BrainyBabe|BrainyBabe]] ([[User talk:BrainyBabe|talk]]) 14:06, 23 September 2009 (UTC)
== Correct nationality of ''Corona''? ==
In this article, [[French frigate Corona (1807)|''Corona'']] is listed as belonging to the Kingdom of Italy, whereas the ship's article says that although built for the Venetian Navy, she was transferred to the French Navy in 1810. One or the other is wrong. [[User:Martocticvs|Martocticvs]] ([[User talk:Martocticvs|talk]]) 12:17, 17 October 2010 (UTC) ::I'll have to check my sources, but I'm pretty sure Corona was actually transferred to the Italian Navy in 1810 (the Kingdom of Italy being a client state of the French Empire). However now I think abou it, the Venetian Navy was disbanded in 1797, which leaves 13 years unaccounted for. Its quite likely that Corona was in French service during this time. I'll have a look over the next few days and see what I come up with.--[[User:Jackyd101|Jackyd101]] ([[User talk:Jackyd101|talk]]) 12:44, 17 October 2010 (UTC)
== "Venetian" ships ==
This is related to the point in the previous section -- the artice speaks throughout of "Venetian" ships, although the Republic of Venice had ceased to exist 13 years earlier. I'm assuming that the ships had been built by Venice and were staffed by Venetian crews, but were flying the flag of the Kingdom of Italy? This should be made clearer at some point. --[[User:Jfruh|Jfruh]] ([[User talk:Jfruh|talk]]) 22:06, 17 October 2010 (UTC) :The [[Republic of Venice]] was replaced by the [[Venetian Province]]. So "Venetian" is still correct. [[User:Mjroots|Mjroots]] ([[User talk:Mjroots|talk]]) 06:36, 3 May 2016 (UTC)
==Casualties== ''Lloyd's List'' has a list of casualties [https://babel.hathitrust.org/cgi/pt?id=hvd.32044105232920;view=1up;seq=89 here]. [[User:Mjroots|Mjroots]] ([[User talk:Mjroots|talk]]) 06:38, 3 May 2016 (UTC)
